auth.emailPlaceholder: Please enter a valid email address

email.name: Email
email.description: Input field for your email address
email.validation: Please enter a valid email address

profile.nicknameValidationMax: Nickname must be less than 12 characters
profile.imagePlaceholder: Input the url of your avatar image
profile.imageValidationMax: Image url must be less than 1024 characters
profile.imageValidationUrl: Image url must be a URL
profile.rolePlaceholder: Please assign a role to this user.

archiveAlert.title: Archive this article?
archiveAlert.description: Archived articles will no longer be sent to clients.

restoreAlert.title: Restore this article?
restoreAlert.description: Restored articles will be sent to clients.

title.name: Title
title.validationMax: Title must be less than 64 characters

slug.name: Slug
slug.validationMax: Slug must be less than 64 characters

summary.name: Summary
summary.placeholder: Enter a brief summary of the article
summary.description: Short description of the article content
summary.validationMax: Summary must be less than 256 characters

image.name: Image
image.validationMax: Image URL must be less than 512 characters

body.name: Body
body.validationMax: Article content must be less than 20000 characters

commitMsg.name: Commit message
commitMsg.description: Brief description of the changes made
commitMsg.validationMax: Commit message must be less than 128 characters

authorNote.name: Author note
authorNote.validationMax: Author note must be less than 1024 characters

form.nameDescription: Create a new folder to organize your images
form.nameValidation: Folder name must be less than 32 characters

imageUrl.title: Add a New Image URL
imageUrl.description: Add a new image from your blob storage.

delete.title: Delete Image URL
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this Image URL?

form.urlDescription: Enter the URL of the image stored in your blob storage
form.urlPlaceholder: Select a image, or enter image URL manually
form.urlValidation: URL must be less than 512 characters
form.name: Name
form.nameDescription: Enter a descriptive name for the image
form.nameValidation: Name must be less than 32 characters
form.folderPathDescription: Select the folder where you want to store the image
form.urlsPlaceholder:
Please select multiple images.
The URLs of the selected images will be displayed here.
In multiple image mode, image names are generated automatically.
Auto-generated image names can be changed later.

token.title: Access Token
token.description: Access tokens are used to retrieve data from the API

dialog.descriptionBeforeGenerate: Access tokens are confidential credentials used to retrieve data from the API. Please carefully consider your needs before generating a token, as proper management is essential.
dialog.descriptionAfterGenerate: Your access token has been generated. This is confidential information used to access the API. Please ensure proper security measures are in place to protect this token.

deleteAlert.title: Delete Access Token
deleteAlert.description: Are you sure you want to delete this access token? This action cannot be undone, and any applications using this token will lose access immediately.
